Right in the heart of the shopping centre of the town our shop is only 50m from the main ski lifts and 5m from the ski school and lift pass office.  

We have a friendly and professional team with over 15 years of experience.  Dominique and Isabelle are here to advise you and help you choose from some of the best brands on the market giving you a great head start to to a fantastic winter holiday (Salomon, rossignol, Mov’ment, Atomic, Tecnica, Nordica Head, HMR, Redbull, Racer, Julbo, Inov8, Sidas, Siel, Sunto, Piz Bun, Makalu, Pipolaki, Arva and Toko to name a few). You’ll find a broad range of technical products specifically designed for winter sports.

There is parking and a bus stop just in front of the shop and you can have your own equipment serviced or repaired in the shop.

4 hair pin bends after the village of D’Huez, take the right turn in the direction for “Quartiere des Bergers”.  Once you’re in Alpe d’Huez, take the right at the first roundabout and you’re there!  The residences near to us are:  Maeva Les Mélèzes, Odalys Le Christiania, MMV, Pierre et Vacances, Club Med, France Loc, Belambra and the Hotels: Pic Blanc and Alpen Roses.

You’ll find us just next to the main round about at the foot of the pistes and ski lifts.  Within 100m around us we have the main bus stop for the free resort busses, the main lift pass offices, restaurants, a supermarket and a Tabac.

We have made ski, snowboard and snowscoot hire our speciality and you’ll find we have all the equipment, clothing and accessories you could possibly need to take part in all these winter sports.

We constantly maintain and service all our equipment which is carefuly chosen each year from established brands on the market: Cairn, Dainese, Dynastar, Rossignol,Chillout, Sidas, Head, X-bionic and Killtec….

Don’t forget we offer an over nigh storage facility which, being at the foot of the pistes, means you barely have to carry your equipment 1 metre before leaving it in our care for the night or getting out on the slopes the next day!  Just tick the box for overnight storage when you book online.

Receive a faster service when you reserve online, we’ll have your equipment prepared for you when you arrive so you can get out on the mountain as quickly as possible.

_2.directions: Chamonix is one of the rare Alpine resorts with direct access from the motorway: rapid and safe, there’s no need for special equipment to get there! Our shop is easy to access:

By Car: Take the A40 towards Geneva/Chamonix, then take exit N°19 signposted Cluses. Turn right onto the N205 towards Sallanches then after 2km take the 1st left towards Flaine / Les Carroz. We are in the first building on your right 500m after the Col de la Pierre Carée.

By Train: The closest train station is in Cluses, serviced by the high speed trains (TGV) from Paris.

By Air: The closest airports are Geneva, Annecy, Chambery and Lyon.

Only 50m from the Carrefour supermarket, just under Credit Agricole bank, our shop is very easy to access with a large car park just in front.  Getting to the slopes is also very easy.  The Ski cabins are based under the residence Pic de L’Ours only 80m from the shop. 

For our rental clients, our overnight storage is based in the Pyrèneige shop which is just at the base of the ski lifts.

_39.name: La Chapelle d'Abondance
_39.directions: Sabine and her team are here to welcome you to their ski and snowboard hire shop, and offer advice should you need it. Offering a regularly updated selection of rental equipment for all levels and all disciplines. You can also rent mini-skis, cross country skis, sledges and snowshoes. The shop is situated in the center of the resort, on the road facing the Tourist Office. If you fancy treating yourself or are looking for a present, then pop into the Rappes Sport gift shop, you’re sure to find what you’re looking for.

_42.name: La Joue du Loup
_42.address: V8 Shop, La Joue du Loup. 05 250 Agnières-en-Devoluy
_42.directions: Your Ski Republic – V8 shop is at the foot of the slopes, next-door to the newsagents / tabac and welcomes you for: ski and snowboard hire, sales, and a ski servicing workshop. Our experienced team is on hand to help…come and meet us!

_51.name: La Mongie
_51.address: Ski Republic, Magasin Gardères Sport - Avenue du Tourmalet Face Sud - 65200 La Mongie
_51.directions:
Come and visit our family run shop GARDERES SPORT, where our team, based on generations of experience, are here to help you get the best start to your holiday. 

Discover the joy of winter sports for all the family, whether young or old, beginner or expert you’ll find the best equipment to suit your ability and requirements. 

Our rental equipment is chosen from some of the biggest brands on the market such as Volkl, Movement, Salomon, Dalbello and more…

We also have a large range of accessories to choose from such as hats, gloves, goggles, sun glasses, sun cream from Eska, Skeena, Herman, Salomon etc.

Want to take some time out from skiing and try something new?  Why not try snow-shoeing and in  groups up to a maximum of 15 hire a high mountain guide and experience the spectacular mountain scenery away from the pistes, through the forests of snowy tree.  Learn the history of the valley and see the local flora and fauna close up, all finishing with a delicious hot chocolate!

For families with children above 5 years old, we offer a fully guided afternoon for ‘Little Hunters’.  A High mountain guide will take the snow-shoeing, they’ll build igloos, look for animal tracks, enjoy snowball fights, sledging and not forgetting yummy hot chocolate along the way.  A wonderful family afternoon, not easily forgotten (contact the shop directly to reserve +33 6 33 58 64 49)

Looking to get out quickly in the mornings?  You can buy your daily lift pas directly from the shop when you collect your equipment.

At the end of the day as you come off the pistes, don’t forget we offer an overnight-storage not just to look after your skis but disinfect, deodorise and most importantly, dry and warm your boots.  Imagine, warm boots every day! We also offer servicing and repairs for your own equipment.  Both these services are available online to don’t forget to include them when you book.

Come and experience the Grand Tourmalet, reserve your equipment in advance for a fast and easy service in resort and smile, you’re coming to the heart of the Pyrénées!

_68.directions:
Situated at the entrance to the resort, our Les Coches ski hire shop can be found if you take the left at the roundabout, park infront of the first building and walk up just a few steps to the main shopping area.  We are just on the left next to the White Lines bar.  We are very centrally placed and are the closest shop to the Goélia and the Wengen chalets.

Our motto is ‘Be well, ski well’ and our team of enthusiastic professionals, led by Moguls ex-junior world champion, Sam Rochet.  They love sharing their love and knowledge of the best secret runs or indeed to guide you through the countless areas of off-piste in the Paradiski area.

We also have a boutique area to buy and stock up on accessories and technical gear for your holiday.  Gloves, goggles, hats and technical clothing, all carefully chosen from brands such as K2, Rossignol, Salomon, Technica, Le Drapo, Faction, Dye and Pull. 

Don’t forget to reserve your equipment in advance, you won’t waste time the shop and you’ll be quickly on the mountain enjoying your holiday!

_68.name: La Plagne - Montchavin
_68.address: Magasin les 3 Glaciers, Résidence Lagrange Les 3 Glaciers, Chemin du paradisio, Bat n 20, 73210 Bellentre
_68.hours:
Monday to Friday 8.30 am - 11 am and 15.30 pm - 18.30 pm

Saturday to Sunday 8.30 am to 7 pm Non Stop
_68.directions:
Our shop in Montchavin is based in the prestigious 3 Glaciers residence. You can easily get to us on a free resort bus from Montchavin Centre, just in front of the Police Municipale.  By car, take the direction for VVF and 5 hair pin turns later you’ll find our building.  You can also get to the shop via the pistes and we have a pick-up service for those arriving by train to bring you up to the shop (please book this service online).

We have a brand new shop right with a bar and lounge complete with a fire!  Resrve a table at our restaurant gastronomic or pick up your shopping from our grocer or baker for your breakfast.

We have a motto, be-well, ski-well so don’t hesitate to ask for advice from our shop team who are here to advise and guide you through the ski area.  Sam Rochet (ex-Junior Moguls World Champion) and Duncan Hallyday - International Ski Instructor, are happy to share their knowledge and give tips to the best places to ski.  They can also guide you through the numerous off-piste areas that Paradiski has to offer.

We can also help you choose from our collections of accessories and equipment to buy.  We have gloves, helmets, goggles, hats, technical clothing, all chosen from high end brands such as: K2, Rossignol, Salomon, Faction, Technica, le Drapo, Pull In to name just a few.

Our rental stock is chosen from the best brands and serviced after every use to give you the best experience on the snow!

Don’t forget to reserve your equipment in advance online to give you a faster service in resort and get you quickly out on the Mountain to start your holiday!

You’ll find our shop right in the heart of les Menuires in the Croisette shopping area.  We are also very conveniently just next to the ESF ski school and pharmacy, just at the bottom of the main pistes. With a car park within easy walking distance we are very easy to get to for collection and drop-off.

Thanks to our great location we are within easy walking distance of many hotels and residence accommodation such as: Hotel Carla, Pelvoux, Le Menuire Chalet & Spa, Hillary Hotel, Résidence Oxalys, L’Oisans, Burons, Charmettes, Belledonne, Vanoise, Chaviere, Lac du Lou, Alpages, Aravis, Les Lauzes, Caron and many more.

We offer not just ski and snowboard hire on-line but also télémark and touring equipment as well as sledges directly from our shop.  We can also repair and service your own skis and snowboards too.  Due to the size of our shop we can offer overnight storage for your equipment but you need to select the ‘overnight storage’ option when you make your booking online.

We sell a range of winter sports equipment, textiles and accessories (protection, helmets, sunglasses, gloves, thermal sportswear, bags and equipment bags, skis and snowboards and boots).

You’ll also find a wide range of brands to choose from: Burton, Salomon, Rossignol, Dalbello Gnu&Libtech, Leki, Oakley, Dynastar, Smith, Salomon, K2, Scott, Millet, Dakine, Volcom, North Face, Obey, Descente and Bogner.

_14.name: Les Menuires - Reberty 1850
_14.address: Magasin Absolu Sports, Immeuble le Genepi, Reberty 1850, 73440 Les Menuires
_14.directions:
Absolu Sports in Les Menuires Reberty 1850 is just on the edge of the pistes and 150m from the Sunny Express lift.  We’re just opposite the Ski School, Tourist Office and Lift Pass Office.  In our immediate vicinity are the Residences: Boedette, Chanteneige, Coryles, Soldanelles, Origanes, Génépi, les Combes, Armoise, Mélèzes, Côtes d’Or, Tétras Lyre, Hotel Hillary, les Montagnettes; and Chalets: La Spainière and the Hôtel Ours Blanc.  There is a public 5 minute gondola lift to Bruyères.

Our shop offers ski and snowboard hire as well as touring and télémark skis.  You can also find a range of winter sports products to buy: accessories, skis and ski boots. We offer excellent servicing and repair for your own equipment as well as servicing our own equipment after every rental.  All our bindings are regulated based on official rules and all our boots and helmets are dried and treated before each use.

We offer a range of top brands just a few of which are: Salomon, Volkl, Dynastar and Rossignol…

Our shop Rosael Sports can be found in the Reberty 2000 Les Menuires resort. Quarter in the heart of the Chalet du Soleil Residence, justaposed with the hotel Kaya and 50m fro the pistes, just next to Reberty Village, Pierre et Vacances Residences, the Residence Vacances Club du Soleil, the Hotel Hillary, Chalet Lili and the Residence Nécou... Rosael Sports specialise in ski and snowboard hire as well as touring equipment.

Equally we sell winter sports clothing and accessories chosen from the best brands : Kjus, Rossignol, Haglofs, Sportalm, Duvillard, Northface, Reusch, Casco, Julbo, Bollé, X Bionic, Bergans and Pipolaki to name a few.

We offer high quality servicing and repairs in house.  100% of our bindings are set up in conformity with the industry guidelines by our fully qualified skimen.  All our equipment is regularly serviced and waxed to give you the best comfort and experience and all our boots and helmets are dried and disinfected after every rental.

We have chosen our rental equipment from the best brands on the market: Kastle, Lacroix, Rossignol, Dynastar, Volkl and Atomic.

On top of the equipment hire we also have a number of diverse services available to give variety to your holiday: we sell all available lift passes for the ski area (Saint Lary and Piau Engaly), organise snow-shoe outings from the shop with a local guide, sledging with husky dogs and ski school lessons.

With Ski Republic Saint Lary don’t waste time in resort, book online in advance and we’ll have your equipment prepared when you arrive.

We regularly service our equipment to make sure it’s in the best condition for you and we choose our selection carefully each season from leading brands on the market such as: Elan, Coreupt, Nordica,Blizzard, Rossignol, Head and Salomon.

_24.directions:
For 25 years, Chamois Sport shop welcome you into warm and professional atmosphere 7days a week, rue du soleil, just below the shopping area "Caron"

Our Val Thorens shop "Chamois Sport" welcome you for 25 years into a warm and professional atmosphere 7 days a week. It can be found in "rue du Soleil" close to the piste 35m, the Montana Village and the shopping area "Caron" The free shuttle bus stops right by the front door to the shop and everything a skier needs can be found nearby (lift pass office, ski school office, ski lifts, swimming pool, post office, restaurants, bars…) and within walking distance.
We specialize in ski and board rental, but also offer a range of accessories including gloves, helmets, sunglasses and goggles… Our rental equipment is regularly serviced and up-dated at the beginning of every season, meaning that you will always find the latest models.

Don’t waste valuable time, book via our website and your equipment will be waiting for you in resort.

We specialize in ski and board rental, but also offer a range of accessories including gloves, helmets, sunglasses and goggles… Our rental equipment is regularly serviced and up-dated at the beginning of every season, meaning that you will always find the latest models.
We work with: Head, Rossignol, Dynastar, Salomon, Dakine, Dainese, Le Drapo, Scott, Level, Uvex…

Don’t waste valuable time, book via our website and your equipment will be waiting for you in resort.

Our Vallandry shop is located in the centre of resort, at most 20m from the ski school office, the lift pass office, the ski lifts, supermarkets, bars and restaurants….
No matter where you are staying you’re just moments away and being at the foot of the slopes we are ski-in, ski-out!
Not only do we offer a fully stocked, regularly updated rental selection of skis and boards, we also stock accessories such as gloves, sunglasses, back protectors, helmets and goggles. Our team are here to help if you have any questions.
Rossignol, Dynastar, Salomon, Le Drapo, Scott, Level, Icepeak , are some of the brands available in this shop, to name just a few !

Remember to book online to benefit from our best prices!

_55.name: Valloire
_55.address: Magnin Sports - Rue des Grandes Alpes - 73 450 VALLOIRE
_55.directions:
Our ski and snowboard hire shop was established in 1947 and is situated in the centre of Valloire. Take advantage of our experienced team who are here to help you chose your equipment and offer advice.

By Car : Take the A43 to St Michel de Maurienne, then 17kms on the D 902 to Valloir. Then use the Church car park, which has 91 spaces – 2 hours free parking.

By Train: The nearest station is St-Michel-Valloir (17kms away). It is served by TGV from Paris and Chambery and also regional services.

By Air: The closest airports are Lyon/St Exupéry, Chambery and Geneva.

_57.name: Valmeinier

Our Ski Republic hire shop in Valmorel is ideally located: at the entrance to Valmorel, is the free car park P8, the shop is in the middle of the pedestrian street on top of the car park P8.
We offer not only ski and snowboard hire, but also a sales department stocking skiwear and accessories including helmets, back protectors, gloves, goggles…
Our experienced team is here to help should you need any advice, when choosing from top name brands such as Rossignol, Head, Dynastar, Millet, Salomon, Burton, Bollé, Brekka…

For those of you wanting to get straight out onto the slopes without wasting time, book in advance and your skis/boards will be prepared for you the night before.

_85.name: Claviere Front de neige - Vialattea
_85.directions: Directly on the nursery slope, next to the ski school and conveniently near two main ski lifts, this rental shop has all levels of skis available and snowboards with an up to date workshop. Ski and snowboard rental, servicing and a state of the art Wintersteiger deposit. Ski din settings computerized.

_85.name: Claviere Village - Vialattea
_85.directions: Situated on the beautiful alpine high street of Claviere only 50 meters from the slopes. This rental shop offers a large selection of skis and snowboards and all the equipment required for your best ski holiday experience. With a brand new computerized rental system, for the  din settings for your unique rental experience.

Via Des Forges, 5

11013 Courmayeur (AO)

_83.name: Ski Republic - Sauze village - Maison Clataud Sport
_83.directions: In the heart of Sauze d’Oulx, just a few steps away from the hotels and the ski slopes, you will find our main shop where you can hire and buy all the best of the skiing equipment. Some of our brands: Salomon, Volkl, Atomic, Bilzzard, Line, Armada, Dalbello and more. Among the equipment for rent the latest freeride and freestyle skis and snowboards, skis with skins for uphill ascent, split snowboards and much more. Try before you buy formula is available. Computerized ISO, ski-binding setting.

_83.name: Ski Republic - Sportinia - Maison Clataud Sport
_83.directions: This almost newly built rental shop/deposit, is located in Sportinia, the heart of the Sauze d’Oulx skiing area, next to the Orso Bianco hotel. Here you can rent your equipment directly on the slopes and take advantage of the deposit situated at the arrival of the Sauze-Sportinia lift. We work as a service centre for the customers of our twin shops in Sauze and Sestriere and have available ski/snowboard tuning services.

_79.name: Sestrière - Ski Republic - Maison Clataud Sport
_79.directions: One of the best places to rent skiing equipment and to buy acessories in Sestriere. The shop is centrally located on the Piazza Kandahar. Skis, snowboards, boots, snowshoes, free-ride and free-style skis, acessories, everything that you might need for your day on the slopes you can find it here. The rental system is current and computerized, and the ski lab is modern and fully equiped.

_31.name: Pas De La Case
_31.address: SKI REPUBLIC Snow Torb - Avenue d'Encamp, 33 AD200 PAS DE LA CASA
_31.directions: Our ski rental shop is at the foot of the pistes, 10m from the skilifts, and 50m from the ticket office and PARKING "Les Abeilletes". You’ll find the Ski Republic sign directly above the restaurants of the Arcades de l’Avenue d’Encamp. We also offer ski minding, allowing you to move freely about the resort, and free, direct and practical access to the pistes of Grandvalira.
